text:
A novel, mRNA-based #vaccine (CVnCoV) induces robust humoral and cellular responses in nonhuman primates. Animals vaccinated with CVnCoV were protected from #SARSCoV2 #infection. Clinical trials are ongoing in phase 2b/3 efficacy studies.
https://t.co/ACgTeXlx9e #COVID19 https://t.co/r7a9C5fIQe
